thought: To craft a sticky piston I need to craft an iron ingot, spruce planks, redstone, and a piston. The first step is to craft an iron ingot. An iron ingot can be crafted by smelting an iron ore or by crafting nine iron nuggets. I have one iron block in my inventory, which can be used to craft nine iron ingots, so I will move the iron block to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: sticky_piston

thought: Now that I have crafted the iron ingots, I need to move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

Ok
